name: Crime Game
description:
Crime Game - 2d top-down shooter. There are 3 weapon spawners on the map. In the upper left corner is your mission. Try to score the most points

WASD - Moving

SPACE - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

Mouse Wheel (also inventory buttons) - Change weapon

R - Recharge

LeftShift - "Pause" (slow-down time)

Escape - Pause

Attributes:

Some arts was created by  Freepik, pch.vector / Freepik and designer, whose twitter is @KayLousberg
